pageTitle: Itinerary for Monday, May 29, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Monday, May 29, 2017:

Monday, May 29, 2017

Rome, Italy

10:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will visit the Roma Soccer Club Stadium and meet with players to highlight the Open Goal initiative.

Olympic Stadium

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

Vatican City

12:30 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will arrive at Vatican City.

Note for media:

  • Open coverage

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will have private audience with His Holiness Pope Francis.

Papal Private Library
Apostolic Palace
Vatican

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

1:20 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the Secretary of State of the Holy See, His Eminence Cardinal Pietro Parolin.

Office of the Secretary of State
Vatican

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity

2:00 p.m. The Prime Minister and Ms. Grégoire Trudeau will visit Saint Peter’s Basilica and the Sistine Chapel.

Vatican

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity for a portion of the visit

Rome, Italy

5:30 p.m. The Prime Minister will meet with the President of the Italian Republic, His Excellency Sergio Mattarella.

President’s Office
Quirinal Palace

Note for media:

  • Pooled photo opportunity


Note: all times local
